name: Srgya and the Swamp of Death
name_original: Srgya and the Swamp of Death
description:
Srgya's Quest has begun!

The sewer has been demolished. Hot, gushing lava has made its way deep into the pipes, and  a host of red-eyed bats have made their home in there. If the sewer is taken over, then nowhere is safe. Take on the role of Srgya, the dragon, and rescue the sewers from the clutches of the evil beings! Leap off walls, smash obstacles, and ultimately rescue the sewer from utter destruction. Play it for free on the web from any Linux, Windows, or Mac device*!

Controls

LEFT (while on ground) walk left (while in air) curve right

RIGHT (while on ground) walk right (while in air) curve left

UP/SPACE (while standing still )  leap

*The game is playable from MacOS as well, but must be ran from a third party browser, such as Firefox-it cannot be played on Safari!
